LSTM based model ATAE - LSTM.from sentence: LSTM based model ATAE - LSTM has the worst performance of all neural networks .

improves.from sentence: GCAE improves the performance by 1.1 % to 2.5 % compared with ATAE - LSTM .

achieves.from sentence: GCAE achieves 4 % higher accuracy than ATAE - LSTM on Restaurant - Large and 5 % higher on SemEval - 2014 on ACSA task .

GCN.from sentence: However , GCN , which does not have aspect modeling part , has higher score than GCAE on the original restaurant dataset .

perform.from sentence: Without the large amount of sentiment lexicons , SVM perform worse than neural methods .

performance.from sentence: With multiple sentiment lexicons , the performance is increased by 7.6 % .

IAN.from sentence:
ATSA
IAN has better performance than TD - LSTM and ATAE - LSTM , because two attention layers guides the representation learning of the context and the entity interactively .

achieves.from sentence: RAM also achieves good accuracy by combining multiple attentions with a recurrent neural network , but it needs more training time as shown in the following section .

GCAE.outperforms: other neural models and basic SVM
GCAE.from sentence: Because of the gating mechanisms and the convolutional layer over aspect terms , GCAE outperforms other neural models and basic SVM .

hard test dataset.from sentence: On the hard test dataset , GCAE has 1 % higher accuracy than RAM on restaurant data and 1.7 % higher on laptop data .
